div.p: Molecular design of D-Ï€-A molecules based on benzodiathiazole moiety ( a) and chemical structures of the model compounds 4,7-bis (thiophen-2-yl) benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole derivative (BTC0) and 4,7-bis(thiophen-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole derivative with a simple introduction of hexyl groups (BTC6) ( b).
